mapper.select: select t.teacher_id as id, t.name, d.name as "department.name", t.gender, t.birth, t.region, t.total_class as totalClass, t.entrance_date as entranceDate, t.job_title as jobTitle, t.grant_date as grantDate, t.political_status as politicalStatus, t.degree, t.graduate_school as graduateSchool from teacher as t, department as d where t.department_id=d.department_id and t.teacher_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into teacher (teacher_id, department_id, name, gender, birth, region, total_class, entrance_date, job_title, grant_date, political_status, degree, graduate_school) values( #{id}, #{department.id}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{region}, #{totalClass}, #{entranceDate}, #{jobTitle}, #{grantDate}, #{politicalStatus}, #{degree}, #{graduateSchool});
mapper.update: update teacher set teacher_id = #{id}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, birth = #{birth}, region = #{region}, total_class = #{totalClass}, entrance_date = #{entranceDate}, job_title = #{jobTitle}, grant_date = #{grantDate}, political_status = #{politicalStatus}, degree = #{degree}, graduate_school = #{graduateSchool} where teacher_id=#{id}
update teacher set department_id=#{deptId} where teacher_id=#{id}
